title: Stats&Numerical Methods
description: Concepts of computational modeling and statistics, with examples based on materials science and engineering applications.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and MSE 2001 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
